Muzhakkam Ponnan 04 Saamanthippoo 03 Neerottam Kumar ====1970s==== Year S.No: Film Role Notes 1979 02 Agal Vilakku 1979 01 Inikkum Ilamai ===As producer=== Vijayakanth with his brother-in-law L. K. Sudheesh has produced films under the company Captain Cine Creations. *Vallarasu (2000) *Narasimha (2001) *Thennavan (2003) *Engal Anna (2004) *Sudesi (2006) *Arasangam (2008) *Viruthagiri (2010) *Sagaptham (2015) ==References== Category:Indian filmographies
